pages.title: Trading with Hobgoblins
pages.text: Hobgoblins are friendly creatures often found in forested biomes in groups, especially nearby $(l:dimensions/goblin_hut)Hobgoblin Huts$(/l) structures.$(2br)They are neutral, but will attack back if provoked.

pages.title: Hobgoblins and Villages
pages.text: Hobgoblins will raid and take over villages. When a village is nearby, they also tend to offer trades in a manner not too dissimilar from $(item)Villager$() trading.$(p)Like Villagers, they have different specializations, and some of them may know the secret to forge $(l:resources/koboldite)Koboldite$(/l) into other forms, like Nuggets and Ingots.

pages.title: Koboldite source
pages.text: Using a $(item)Lead$() on a Hobgoblin will incline them to perform manual labor. When leashed, they will pick up dropped items and drop them into nearby chests.$(p)Giving a Hobgoblin a $(item)Pickaxe$() will make it begin mining. Occasionally, they can find $(l:resources/koboldite)Koboldite Dust$(/l).$(br)The chance increases when they mine using a $(l:artifacts/tools/koboldite_pickaxe)Koboldite Pickaxe$(/l).

pages.title: Hobgoblin worshipping
pages.text: Hobgoblins worship their gods, $(item)Mog$() and $(item)Gulg$(). If a bound $(l:artifacts/statues/hobgoblin_patron)Statue of Hobgoblin Patron$(/l) is nearby, they will begin worshipping it, recharging $(l:kettle/infusion_intro#power)Infusion Power$(/l) of the player the statue is bound to.$(br)Worshipping Hobgoblins also increase the power of the $(item)Mystic Branch$() and its effects, but remember, if too many Hobgoblins worship the statue, Mog and Gulg will descend to slay the player.
pages._comment: Unlocked when Mog and Gulg descend
